question: Which purposes does an Internet gateway server serve? (Choose two)

answers.A: Use CloudFront to serve the image.
answers.B: Serve the image directly from an Amazon S3 bucket.
answers.C: Use Route 53 as your DNS service, and choose its latency-based routing to serve the image out of both us-east-1 and us-west-2.
answers.D: Use cookies rather than loading the images with each web page load.
